3.0.8.en: Netgear package 4.0.2. Switch to Homey Compose app structure. Migrate 'SSID' to 'ssid' capability. Compatibility test timeout fix.

3.0.7.en: Netgear package 4.0.0. Added more validity checks for attached devices. Compatibility test timeout partial fix.

3.0.5.en: Netgear package 3.9.9. Fixed fw update on R7000. Fix parsing of <unknown> devices. Fix delete Devicelist. Selectable login method added.

3.0.4.en: Presence Detection and Energy support - stable release

3.0.3.en: Energy and Presence detection - Stable release
